column4: my squid ubuntu server with two NIC doesnt work. one is for wan IP and one is LAN
can you expand on 'doesn't work'. It's near meaningless
yes. I configured bind9 and squid as documenation said. but I can't get internet through proxy on my client
my server and clients are also on Vbox as guest
use the menus at the top of the running vbax, there is the option to download there
yes. I did. I found CDRom inside media or somewhere. but when I run .sh file. it disappear like splash screen. and it was not installed properly
try asking in #vbox
no answer
I asked thousandtimes . may be they are not using ubuntu on vbox
does the ISO pass MD5 test?
which version of Ubuntu are you using?
sure. mine is zentyal.
is Zentyal the host OS, or the guest OS?
Zentyal on Guest. WinXP is host
this is ubuntu support only. not zentyal
I see i asked in properly channel already and finally I asked here as no response for days
can ubuntu print to it ok?
what are you using to share the data?
ubuntuone
so you are giving a URL and they are downloading the file?
sure
I could download it from my browser on my computer. but they didn't
